TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Pabuisan, title = Pabuisan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pabuisan} }

S.FORM: Pabuisan Itiniay i Xincheng Cen no Hualien ko Pabuisan a niyaro', 140 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 377 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 46% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 175 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 54% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 202 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 17%, 撒奇拉雅族1%, Bunun 2%, Tayal 1%, Truku 8%, Paiwan1%, roma1%.

Paboisan Itiniay i Xincheng Cen no Hoalien ko Paboisan a niyaro', 140 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 377 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 46% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 175 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 54% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 202 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 17%, 撒奇拉雅族1%, Bonon 2%, Tayal 1%, Troko 8%, Paiwan1%, roma1%.
